sentences.en: He called his book, The Last Hurrah.
sentences.cn: 他把他的书叫做最后的欢呼.

sentences.en: His unsuccessful senate run was his last hurrah.
sentences.cn: 这次失败的参议员竞选是他最后的尝试.

sentences.en: Hurrah , Mark's broken the 7.38 - meter record in the hammer.
sentences.cn: 好啊, 马克打破了链球项目 7.38 米的记录.

sentences.en: Hurrah , Mark's broken the 73.80 - metre record in the hammer.
sentences.cn: 好啊, 马克打破了链球项目 73.80 米的纪录.

sentences.en: Hurrah , my boys, hurrah ! Hurrah, my boys, hurrah ! at the knocker and ring at the bell.
sentences.cn: 我们到处把它找, 发现它在灌丛里.太棒啦,孩子们,万岁! 太棒啦, 孩子们, 万岁! 叩响门环, 按响铃.

sentences.en: Hurrah for Zero which leaves me in peace!
sentences.cn: 虚空万岁,虚空才能叫人安心.

sentences.en: In retrospect, that campaign looks like his last hurrah.
sentences.cn: 回顾起来, 那次竞选看起来像是他的最后奋力一博.

sentences.en: It's one last hurrah for 2008. It's quite a storm.
sentences.cn: 这是2008年的最后一声欢呼. 暴风雪相当的大.

sentences.en: Jackson’s hurrah boys also played a part in the election to choose the next president.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊的“欢呼男孩”在下一任总统的选举中也起到了一定作用。

sentences.en: Let's give the team a big hurrah.
sentences.cn: 让我们为那支队伍大声叫好.

sentences.en: Mainstream Keynesian economics is facing its last hurrah.
sentences.cn: 主流凯恩斯经济学正面临着最后的狂欢.

sentences.en: The assistants raised a formidable hurrah.
sentences.cn: 助手们发出了一片震天的欢呼声.

sentences.en: We hurrah when we see the soldiers go by.
sentences.cn: 我们看到士兵经过时向他们欢呼.
